# Administrative Assistant (AA) SOP This is the list of procedures, responsibilities, and duties of the [color=#1b67a5][bold]Administrative Assistant[/bold][/color] of this station.
1. The Administrative Assistant must carry out any order a head of staff gives them. (This does not apply if the order breaks SOP or Space Law.)
2. The Administrative Assistant is not obligated to run errands for the NanoTrasen Representative.
3. The Administrative Assistant is permitted to carry a flash on all alert levels.
4. The Administrative Assistant should not act as a Security Officer.
5. The bridge must stay clean under the AA's watch. If the mess is too large they should call a janitor to assist.
6. The Administrative Assistant is not permitted to distribute the NanoTrasen Approved Premium Coffee to any non command personnel under any circumstance.
7. Command personnel cannot be allowed more than one cup of NanoTrasen Approved Premium Coffee at a time. NT isn't responsible for any heart attacks after consuming the premium coffee, [color=#FF0000][bold]YOU[/bold][/color] ARE.
8. Administrative Assistants are not permitted to ask for raises.
